channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: What to know about the Newark mayor’s arrest at an immigration detention center
item.description: An immigration detention center in New Jersey is at the center of tensions between three congressional Democrats and the Trump administration after the arrest of Newark’s mayor outside the facility.

item.title: Trump administration fires top copyright official days after firing Librarian of Congress
A Republican push to sell public lands in the West is reigniting a political fight
